knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

## Including Plots


```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
load('simbetaLinearOR.RData')
for (i in 1:3) {
  par(las=1)
  plot(S1ORlinear$beta.pooled.sim1.nor[,i],type='l',col=2,ylab = 'beta.pooled',xlab='iteration',main = 'beta.pooled')
  lines(S1ORlinear$beta.pooled.sim2.nor[,i],type='l',col='cadetblue2')
}

```

```{r pr, echo=FALSE}
library(MASS)
for (i in 1:3) {
  truehist(S1ORlinear$beta.pooled.sim1.nor[,i],xlab = 'beta.pooled',las=1)
}

```

```{r p, echo=FALSE}
for (i in 1:3) {
  truehist(S1ORlinear$beta.pooled.sim2.nor[,i],xlab = 'beta.pooled',las=1,col=4)
}

```
